name: Change (prototype)
description:
Change is a prototype solo setting-neutral worldbuilder using the change in your pocket. It was made as part of a one-page RPG jam in 2019, but I am rereleasing it now as part of my “Free Thing Of The Month”. 

The graphics and design were all done with free software and are very basic. Though the game works as is, I would like to one day revisit it with a new layout and design. 

Feedback is always welcome!
